name: Mops and Bot
description:
Fair Warning, this game is difficult. Was gunning for a cross between a Cuphead plane level and a Contra boss. You are encouraged to mix and match TrooperBot modifications for your preferred playing experience.

After their last adventure, Bot was able to upload his sentience into an available TrooperBot. Hitch a ride as Mr. Mops and outfit Bot’s new getup as you see fit for battle with the space station’s cranky, ancient CRT.

Using Shield consumes your power cell energy if you don’t select infinite shield. There is a chance the boss’ weak-points will spawn extra cells.

Please use the modifications to best fit your ability and desired challenge.

Known Bug:
There is a very slim chance you’ll hit a bug that halts the game … the good/bad news is it only happens if you die while the chasing bullet is out (it’s rare, but can happen). You were dead anyway, I guess! Give it another try. You’ll get that S rank no problem. I found it after submission. Took two minutes to fix, so I will update this page with the new build as soon as ratings for the jam are over.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS MoveWASD or Arrow KeysShootJ or C, you can hold for continuous fire. DashK or X and a directional input. ShieldL or Z — uses your energy cells for power.MenuMouse to select modifications or menu options. GAMEPAD CONTROLS Move D-Pad or Left Analog StickShoot West Button - you can hold for continuous fire. Dash South Button and a directional input. Shield North Button — uses your energy cells for power.Menu Mouse … sorry to make you switch back and forth. 

Hold Shift and press R | Restart Game

Made for GDKO, a game jam tournament hosted by Xanderwood. 

Round 3 Task: Create a Boss Fight.

CREDITS - All art, code and concept by MF of Endmark Games (music made using Ecrett Music). - Kenney Blocks font and Kenney Mini font from Kenney. - Adjusted version of the Famicube Palette by Arne on Lospec.
